######## BORDER / GRAPH ########

4800 4820 4C40

x4800 = 40 0C = 40 4C

0c = 00001100	(no flip)
4c = 01001100	(horizontal flip)
cc = 11001100	(both flip)
8c = 10001100	(vertical flip)

40 8C / 40 CC 

00 00 = 4000
01 00 = 4020
08 00 = 4100

12 08 = x4240
22 08 = x4440
23 08 = x4460
50

End of week
Weeks remaining

######## Original Order ########
CE92D-CECED		Length: x3c1 (961)
(Move to 1CFA00, 1C0000 + FA00

With place holder:
63 0C 73 0C 64 08 65 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 73 4C 63 4C 
63 0C 73 0C 74 08 75 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 
10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 10 08 73 4C 63 4C

VARIABLES FOR SCENARIO MODE (CEF46-CEFB5)
02 0C 03 0C 04 0C 05 0C 06 0C 07 0C 08 0C 09 0C 
0A 0C 0B 0C 0C 0C 0D 0C 0E 0C 0F 0C 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 22 08 23 08 24 08 25 08 2E 08 
2F 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

1A 0C 1B 0C 1C 0C 1D 0C 1E 0C 1F 0C 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 32 08 33 08 34 08 35 08 3E 08
3F 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

English xCEF46:
55 00 55 00 55 00 22 08 23 08 24 08 00 08 25 08 
26 08 55 00 27 08 28 08 29 08 2a 08 55 08 00 00 
55 08 00 00 00 00 55 08 55 08 00 08 00 08 2E 08 
2F 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 32 08 33 08 34 08 00 08 35 08 
36 08 00 08 37 08 38 08 39 08 3a 08 55 08 00 00 
55 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3E 08 
3F 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

######## SCENARIO Mode ########

シナリオモード  3週目!

16 chars - 1 space - 2 digits - 6 chars 

  End of week

x4040 x4060 x4080 x40a0
x4240 x4260 x4280 x42a0

63 0C 73 0C 64 08 65 08 10 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 
22 08 23 08 24 08 00 08 25 08 26 08 00 08 27 08 
28 08 29 08 2a 08 45 08 00 00 47 08 00 00 00 00 
85 08 8A 08 00 08 00 08 2E 08 2F 08 73 4C 63 4C 
63 0C 73 0C 74 08 75 08 10 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 
32 08 33 08 34 08 00 08 35 08 36 08 00 08 37 08 
38 08 39 08 3a 08 55 08 00 00 59 08 00 00 00 00 
95 08 9A 08 00 00 00 00 3E 08 3F 08 73 4C 63 4C

#### Score Screen Normal Mode ####

On the score screen, the top left says the game mode (e.g. シナリオモード for screnario), the top right the week (3週目 for 3rd week)

王座決定まで あと  44週
Weeks left: 
44 weeks until the title is decided
Weeks remaining:

63 0C 73 0C 64 08 65 08 10 08 02 0C 03 0C 04 0C 
05 0C 06 0C 00 00 07 0C 08 0C 09 0C 0A 0C 0B 0C 
0C 0C 0D 0C 0E 0C 0F 0C 42 08 00 00 00 00 82 08 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2E 08 2F 08 73 4C 63 4C 
63 0C 73 0C 74 08 75 08 10 08 12 0C 13 0C 14 0C 
15 0C 16 0C 00 00 17 0C 18 0C 19 0C 1A 0C 1B 0C 
1C 0C 1D 0C 1E 0C 1F 0C 52 08 00 00 00 00 92 08 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3E 08 3F 08 73 4C 63 4C

SPRITES
CDD63-CE92C
DD63

ORDER
CE92D-CECED		Length: x3c1 (961)
(Move to 1CFA00, 1C0000 + FA00

$99:E92D

C0000

$99:E92B == C0000 + E92B
CE92B

$99:E92B


$39:DD63
38*8000 + DD63 = 1CDD63

1CE92B


00 20 06

Original Compressed length : 3017

Compressed length : 3927

x11B33
x11B4B

$82/9B33 A0 99 00    LDY #$0099              A:0704 X:06DE Y:E6BF P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B36 84 22       STY $22    [$00:0022]   A:0704 X:06DE Y:0099 P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B38 A0 63 DD    LDY #$DD63              A:0704 X:06DE Y:0099 P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B3B 84 20       STY $20    [$00:0020]   A:0704 X:06DE Y:DD63 P:eNvMxdIzC

$82/9B4B A0 99 00    LDY #$0099              A:CFDC X:06DE Y:007E P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B4E 84 22       STY $22    [$00:0022]   A:CFDC X:06DE Y:0099 P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B50 A0 2D E9    LDY #$E92D              A:CFDC X:06DE Y:0099 P:envMxdIzC
$82/9B53 84 20       STY $20    [$00:0020]   A:CFDC X:06DE Y:E92D P:eNvMxdIzC
